node.title: BitTorrent Now Accepts TUSD TRC20 for Pro, Pro+VPN and Ad-Free Products
node.content:
We are pleased to announce that customers can pay for BitTorrent and µTorrent premium products, including Pro, Pro+VPN and Ad-Free with TUSD TRC20. With the help of CoinPayments.net, a leading integrated payment gateway provider for cryptocurrencies, the TRC20 version of TUSD joins TRX, BTC, BNB, BTT, OKB, and BUSD as accepted forms of digital payment. 

TrueUSD (TUSD) is the first independently-verified digital asset redeemable 1-for-1 in US Dollars. The multichain stablecoin uses various banks, escrow accounts, and third-party attestations to reduce counterparty risk, provide transparency, and prevent fraud.

If you would like to learn more about our premium products, please follow these links: BitTorrent Web, BitTorrent Classic, µTorrent Web, µTorrent Classic. To learn how to purchase our products using digital currency, here’s a short tutorial:

Step 1.

Click the ‘Buy with crypto’ link on the BitTorrent.com or uTorrent.com website.

Step 2.

Enter your name and your email address. Agree to the terms and click ‘Place Order.’

Step 3.

Click to select your currency, then click ‘Complete Checkout’.

Step 4.

Take note of both the amount and the public key, then navigate to your wallet.

Step 5.

From your wallet, paste both the exact amount and the public key, then send.

Step 6.

Wait for the transaction to clear, then look for the email with your product key and instructions to activate. You’re done!
